document_data.caption2: The armory's depiction on maps of different eras
document_data.name: Armory of Waterdeep
document_data.mainbody: This building was '''the armory''' of the [[City Guard (Waterdeep)|City Guard]] in [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Location: The armory stood along [[Trollkill Street]] in the [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]], south of [[North Tower]] and the [[Sated Satyr]].
document_data.Structure: This structure stood three stories tall and was directly connected to the city walls that separated Sea Ward from the [[Waterdeep/Field Ward|Field Ward]].
document_data.Activities: Though this armory was primarily under the purview of the City Guard, the [[City Watch (Waterdeep)|City Watch]] also had access to it.<ref>
